review: Phenomenal product. Sets up easy. Works better than well. While current content is "small" there is more than enough to slake every thirst.
author: C. Lance Barnett "Dancing Man"

review: Excellent product. Does exactly what it says, and does it well. My son plays his minecraft youtube videos to our big tv while we are watching our own tv which is a bit annoying. There is no protection on the chromecast, so anyone who is on your network can "cast" to it via DIAL. But still it is an excellent product for the price. Can't wait for more compatible apps to come now that the SDK is released. I primarily use it for Netflix and YT. Would like to see BBC iplayer, Ted, and more apps able to cast.
author: mitchd

review: I love this, I am currently on a budge, and borrow my neighbors Wi-fi.  This beautiful piece of technology allows me to stream music and movies (via my Netflix account) with a click of a button from my Android phone.  No subscriptions required, one time purchase.  I have moved it between my house and my girlfriends, works great!
author: Shannon Cordero

review: Bought this for use with HD TV and apple products and found its function to be very limited. Few apps support streaming to chromecast at this time. However, for HBO GO, Netflix and YouTube it works great
